attributes.action: create a bank holiday on St George's Day (April 23rd)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We - Ditchy and Salty and our colleagues -  would like the opportunity to celebrate England on a bank holiday dedicated to St George, England’s national patron saint.

We feel that not enough emphasis is placed on celebrating England and her history and cultural heritage.

St George’s Day is April 23rd but many people are unaware of the date and it has been allowed to pass unnoticed for too long.

We feel that other national saints day, such as St Patrick’s Day, are given more prominence than our own national saints day.

Marking April 23rd with a bank holiday would be an opportunity to celebrate England and everyone within it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
